meaningMnemonic: If you can <radical>guard</radical> your <radical>soul</radical> from bad things you'll always feel <kanji>delight</kanji> and <kanji>joy</kanji>. It's hard to guard your soul from everything though, so take all the joy you can, while you can.
readingMnemonic: The <kanji>delight</kanji> you feel is so great that it becomes permanently <reading>etch</reading>ed (えつ) in your soul and even your face.
